item.title: Exploratory Spatial Data Analysis
item.description: About the project This project has been in my repository for a while, being my first personal project and involving from web-scraping to data modeling. Recently, I discover Spatial Analysis and I would like to share my approach and how can we create features into the data that has coordinates. I could summarized my discoveries as following. 1.- The power of Spatial Data visualization. 2.- Having statistical test is useful to not waste time.
